Select Location for Project Database

Use the Select Location for Project Database dialog box (Admin | Create Project Database | Location browse button) to select a directory as the container for a new project database. The directory you select will contain the projects, configuration settings, archives, and access control information for all projects within the project database.

Field Descriptions

Look in Select a valid drive or directory. The contents of the drive or path you select appear in the Contents list.
Opens the directory one level above the current level. This button is disabled if you are at the top level of a directory.
Creates a new folder in the currently selected directory. You may rename the new folder using in-place editing. The following characters are not allowed in new folder names: \ / : * ? " < > | .
Contents list Select a directory that will contain the files associated with the project database. To display the contents of a directory, double-click the directory icon. The Look in and Folder name fields are updated upon selection.
Folder name Use the Look in and Contents list fields to select and display a folder name, or enter a path and folder name for the project database files.
